data.client_settings: Non applicable as it is cross platform. Personally I accessed the dev dashboard on Firefox for Android 61.0.2 and observed the issue in the Android client (Discord Alpha 7.2.9)
data.actual_result: As long as the bot stays offline, it will be in a state where it has no profile picture in the chat history, but keeps it in his profile
data.expected_result: The profile picture should uniformly appear removed across the client: either both in profile and in chat history, or none of them until the bot goes online
data.short_description: If you remove the profile picture of a bot through the dev panel while the bot account is offline, the profile picture will remove in chat history but not in profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a bot with a profile picture set - Have it send a few messages in the channel of your choice - Disconnect your bot and make sure it is completely offline - Go to the Discord developers dashboard, go to the Bot tab, and remove the profile picture of the bot account - Refresh your client to make sure the old profile picture would not stay cached - Open the channel where the bot sent the messages back in step 2. Notice the profile picture is gone - Now open the profile of the bot. Notice the profile picture is still there
